titles.title: An original bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the burial in cemeteries of the National Cemetery System of certain deceased Reservists and the dependents of such Reservists.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Veterans. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Rockefeller. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 262.

action.text: Senate incorporated this measure in H.R. 821 as an amendment.
Senate passed companion measure H.R. 821 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote. (consideration: CR 11/10/93 S15636-15637)
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/4/1993--Introduced. Extends eligibility for burial in a national cemetery to any member or former member of the armed forces (and his or her dependents) who has performed at least 20 years of service under honorable conditions and who is eligible for retired pay.
